attributes.action: Petition to Address the Escalating of Exorbitant Car Insurance Prices in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
We urgently urge the GOV UK to tackle soaring car insurance prices, particularly for the 18-25 age group. Key proposals include:

Enforce Price Caps: Set maximum limits (e.g., £1500) on premiums for affordability.
Transparent Calculations: Encourage fair methods considering individual driving records.
Regular Oversight: Establish a regulatory body for consistent market monitoring.
Promote Competition: Incentivise innovation and diverse policy options.
attributes.background: Highlighting the soaring car insurance costs in the UK, especially affecting younger drivers. These high premiums burden individuals aged 18-25, limiting access to services and opportunities, hindering economic mobility, and risking long-term financial stability.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign:

Place a Cap on Motor Insurance Premium Increases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/649918

Introduce fixed prices for car insurance based on power to weight ratio and age: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/646793

Establish a Commission to investigate extortionate Car Insurance price rises: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/644067
